title: (x) Compressed serif face - Chevron {Akira}
content:
Looks almost identical to Robotik, but the “M” is different. Can anyone help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080518143429im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bryan_5442.gif)

author: rickruss
